title: IndieLeap: Key User Journey Outlines
description: Detailed documentation of key user journeys within the IndieLeap platform, including artist onboarding and first release, fan discovery and engagement, and licensor search and license request processes.
author: William Roberts
preview: This document outlines the high-level steps for major user interactions within the IndieLeap platform, focusing on key journeys for artists, fans, and licensors.
